title: Bug 15899 - 'Close all saved' does not work consistently
OB: When using build 20020508 with the latest UI code, I encountered a problem with the 'Close All Saved' feature. Specifically, after closing all the file editors, when I created a new file named 'f1.txt' and selected 'Close All Saved' from the file menu, nothing happened.
SR:
To reproduce this issue, please follow these steps:
1. Use build 20020508 with the latest UI code.
2. Close all file editors.
3. Create a new file named 'f1.txt'.
4. From the file menu, select 'Close All Saved'.
